name: NIGHT 0.
description:
This is a Demo version, more updates coming soon!

Your Objective is to collect 9 eyeballs and place them on top of the tomb to open the main gate and escape the forest, but beware.. you're not alone.

CONTROLS.

WASD - Move.

Mouse to look.

Right click - Interact

E - Look at creature when chasing.

I'm interested for your feedback!
